language.entry: Grove Tender

Her silk dress and wooden stick are not suited for the battlefield. But it is likely that the stick has a supernatural will to protect its own master. And there is a silhouette of a lady which resembles the child...

Grove Tender is a child with supernatural recovering skills. She might be weak physically in comparison with grown-ups, but she can skillfully escape through enemies' attacks. And they'll be soon punished by a sharp homi in this clever child's small hand.

Grove Tender mixes exotic herbs with elixirs to enhance them, and uses mint leaves to fill up the pillows to relieve insomnia. She is pretty cute when she demands a bedtime story... only until she starts to murmur at her stick.
I'm not going with a death-thirsty dumbass!
I'm not sure if you're going to use that flail only for the enemies.
Your head must be infertile. Hair isn't growing on it.
You'd fit better in the brothel.
How can you be so harsh to your body? Do you not know how precious life is!
How dare you, you little...
She's afraid of the pain. Take her away from me.
Get this naughty kid away from me.
Ain't nobody punishing this child?
Is that all?
Toy Bird Stick
Nice Bird Stick
Decorated Bird Stick
Soulful Bird Stick
"Sacred Branch"
Bird Stick
Worn Silk Dress and Winter Cap
Quilted Silk Dress and Winter Cap
Starched Silk Dress and Winter Cap
Colorful Silk Dress and Winter Cap
"Whisper of Blooms"
Silk Dress and Winter Cap
Toy Trowel
Wooden Bowl
Graceful Nambawi
Goldenfish Ornament
Favorite Snack
Awake Catastro-flower seed
Birthday Present
Mom's Treasure
"My whole family gets murdered on my birthday eve. How generous."
Faded Lamp
Homi Strike

Herb in Elixir
Mint in Pillow
Bedtime Story
Foreseeing Risk
Great. A perfect mixture.
He saved this for me. Can't miss a drop.
Maybe a piece of bay leaf will work...
A few more drops of essential oil.
*TAPPING PILLOW*
Lavender will ensure a good night's sleep.
*YAWN*
Such sweet voice you have.
*DOZES OFF*
...Let me see.
You've brought a book with you?
Ugh, such remarkable readiness. Pass me the book.
If you insist. Well, once upon a time...
*COUGH*
...This is familiar, somehow.
What a pain.
Huh, where did you get that book from?
...Seriously?
...You're troublesome. Give me that book.
Oh, of course, sweetie.
If it isn't fun, I'll rewrite it.
...Aren't you scared of me, child?
Hmph? ...Ah. Okay.
What CAN'T I do? Give me the book.
Oh my... Give me that book.
I can't believe I came all this way to babysit. Urgh.
I can't say 'no' your request.
Finally, I've been wanting to read something else... oops, Nevermind!
Okay, just pass me the book, dearie.
A star of death, life will fade and its grip will loosen...
The abyss calls your souls... Endless darkness awaits in despair and wrath.
Your body will feed beasts, your soul will be fetched by the dark moon...
I'm holding on. You can do it too.
When the pain is gone, pleasure will come.
You don't have to be the best. Just DO IT.
You've seen me in the battle. This is nothing for me.
I mixed some herbs I had on me. This may help you.
Everyone can get better.
Can a life be judged from only one side? No, it's far more complicated.
Just be as you are.
Hey, please stop blocking my sight.
Will I truly find the Seed here?
I don't like it here. It's dark and damp.
They all look strong. Will there be room for me?
Grrrrgh, be careful while driving a stagecoach.
Stinky air, withered plants... How hopeless.
Oh! This game looks fun!
Will anyone play Monopoly with me?
Stacking cards is fun too.
I'm gonna sleep for a while.
Strawberry flavor please. What? This is pumpkin!
Smells yucky. What on earth do you use?
Is this place what you call a hospital?! Ugh, gosh.
Breathe in... and then out. I'm doing pretty well.
Life and death. Love and birth.
Please wake me up if I doze off.
Maybe the God knows where my mom is.
Quiet as a dandelion. I love it here.
Mama, if you are listening to me... I love you and miss you. Very much.
Isn't there a sunny spot? I should take a nap.
It'd be much better with a flower garden near here.
I should hurry and find the Seed...
Will he know what I'm doing here?
I miss you, mom.
I need some sweets.
Don't get close or I may go mad.
...Please leave me alone.
I said BACK OFF!
Uhh... Maybe another time?
No, the Seed will be elsewhere.
Do you know this is child abuse?
Do I really have to go?
We've already taken a look. It wasn't there.
That place is too easy, even for a kid of eleven.
I'd rather go take a nap.
The Seed will be in a more difficult place. Not there!
Right. Stepping like grown-ups, one, two, one, two...
How far do we have to walk?
My feet are all fine.
No lollygagging.
Wait, hold on!
My feet are starting to ache.
Is something ahead? Why did you stop?
Feels wrong... Is something wrong?
Watch your step!
You almost stepped on my foot!
Not this way.
Why don't we just turn back, and walk forwards?
AHHHHH! MAMAAAAA!!!
I-I-I'm too s-s-small to eat....
I'll be a stew? No way, I'll be a stew?! Why meeee!
Please get me out!
Don't bother my mom!
And you're my new mother? Hooray!
Mama... they bullied me!
Stepmother, huh? Freaking ugly.
What the...?
Oh, um, did I do something wrong?
Ahhh! Mamaaa!
I... am... drowning...
Using salt water for gardening? Are you mad?
I can bear no more... Mother...
No... Not until I have found the Seed...
Sir... I failed...
To my shame, I swore in front of someone...
Petals are withering...
Leaves fall, roots melt in the dirt...
Please don't fall!
No, no! Stand up!
I'm sorry for everything, so please don't die!
He abandoned me...? It's all a lie...
No, Don't look at the flower! Noooo!
Is it something good?
Not the Seed, but still nice.
Do you like it? Yes, YOU.
An ambush! They are here!
Get up everyone! Enemies around us!
*SLAPS FACE*
An ambush! Get ready to fight!
Pfeh, are you losing to a child?
Yeah, go tell your ugly mom!
Nature will rise against you!
Send me to my mom!
I don't want more flowers! I need my mother!
I miss mama. Not my papa.
I am only a kid...
I have no armor or sword...
Please... I'm just a young girl...
No! It's too frightening.
*SHAKES HEAD SIDE TO SIDE*
I'm not hungry... Just scared.
Will one bite kill me?
Mom? Where are you?
Cover the blood or they will find us.
You see? I'm just a child.
I have no power left to hold my stick...
You're not protecting me at all?
So I'm only a burden for you?
Why aren't we going back home?
I can't trust adults. I must survive on my own.
I shouldn't have come with these lowlifes.
Can we run back towards the estate?
EEEEEP!
I'm doing what...?
What if I mess it all up?
...Can I go to sleep?
Why are the adults messing up my life?
Get away from me, you pedophile!
You think I'm just a child?
A seed is missing. Who did it?
Fuck off.
Please shut your mouth, 'cause the flowers hate it.
Get away or I'll slash your neck!
Back off! If any leaf gets hurt...
Why?
i'M nOt GoNnA lIsTeN tO yOu.
You guys can't do such things.
I'm way more useful than your kind. Look.
Everyone must want to throw me away.
Do you know that abusing a child is a serious crime?
Feeding a flower with such things? Nah.
You call this food...?
I heard you saying 'Damn, useless child'.
Wasting these important things on you? Never.
What? Who ordered to retreat?
I'd rather eat soil.
I'd rather be stuck in a flower pot.
Even children can do that! You stupid loser!!
And you're supposed to be a master of fighting since birth?
I saved your life, and you act like this?
Why, why on hell did I trust the adults again!
Don't ignore me!
I hate you!
Another bullshitter again. Great.
So you want me to die?
Hands off!
Want me to die in a hurry?
It's awful. Just like you.
Smells like your ass. Throw it away.
I wish I died.
Have you been fertilizing a dead tree?
I'm not listening to your bullshit.
It's like using pesticide on a garden.
All is fine now. Weaklings like me are going to die!
I want to die. Truly.
I want to go back to the Garden.
Anybody wants to meet the Heir with me?
Stop wasting time.
Rather be blamed by someone else.
Is there anything critical?
How can I die as well?
I'll remember the snack I ate before dying.
Or you can choke me.
Please curse upon me.
Slap me with this stick.
Do you want to smash me?
Whipping is the best discipline.
Why would you hesitate?
Don't you want to punish such an irritating child?
I can't be nice.
Mom must be waiting for me.
I'm stupid and useless.
How can anybody love this useless child?
You've got an easier prey here.
Give a strike on my neck!
I'm. Not. Going.
If I wait here, will something kill me?
Use it for the better person.
I'll manage on my own.
I can deal with my wounds by myself.
Will I be stronger than a grown-up?
You guys are stronger than me.
Your dad is a fish!
Your mom is a swine!
And these dumbasses are heroes? Ha!
You smell like fungus!
When Simon the sorcerer called my aunt 'asian pedophile', I made him into a flower pot.
Face me, you meddling moron!
Face me, pathetic pipsqueak!
Face me, you cowardly clown!
You underestimated my power?
I'm gonna plant your heads in my garden.
So your kinds are 'grown-ups'?
He will punish you for harming me!
May I draw a kitten on your forehead, mister?
Just go sleep.
You skinhead.
You incel.
Have you got an arrow in your knee?
Have ever taken a walk out of the estate?
Didn't want to send me here?
Coming to life again? Hell was better than your face.
I'm not listening to you!
Just fuck off.
If only dad didn't touch her!
I miss my mama. Not my pa... that guy.
Name ten reasons why you are worthier than weeds.
I want no more flowers! Just send me to mom!
The nature will rise against you.
I've dug a grave for your nuts.
I can't trust you, lowlife.
Your face sucks.
I'm surviving this harsh life.
Does anyone mind?
You shouldn't speak like that to a child.
You dumbass!
I've stolen and eaten your stored snacks.
Wait. I'm watering flowers.
I'm hundreds of years older than you.
'Hurt me daddy'? You want to 'Hurt' out of your mouth?!
Bring me a solid iron to plant your head.
Someone is pathetic enough to see me hurt?
You fail to take care of a kid?
And what's for me?
Your weapon is rusted.
A honeybee is more frightening than you.
Ridiculous.
Yeah, they were right...
I'm not dead... But still not alive.
What would mom say if she sees me?
I'd rather die.
Come to life again, as a burden.
Slash my neck please.
Send me to mom! Pierce through my heart!
This useless child will stay away and water flowers.
Leave me. I wish you good luck.
I don't want more flowers! Send me to mom!
How can a flower be more useful than a sword?
Mom? Is it you?
Please bring me back, Main gardener!
One bad apple spoils the barrel. I've heard it a thousand times.
I can't deny my rotten ancestry.
(spilling over her words.)I, ...I'm sorry.
(Drops the spoon.) Umm, Well...
Was it this painful when mother got shot?
Was it this painful when mother got eaten?
I'm not as worthwhile as you.
No! I don't deserve it.
Why are you trying to save my life?
No, use it for a better person.
It doesn't suit me.
Petals are falling. It's too late.
Free me from this body!
Please finish me off!
If you had wanted me to succeed, you should've give me an adult body.
Now I understand why he didn't gave the Five-colored Flower to me...
Bring me a solid iron to plant your head.
Dig from here to there!
Bring me some water. Now.
Look at the flower! It's full of caterpillars!
Prepare a birthday party for me.
Mint is blooming. I should've brought a pig's bladder to make some drinks.
Today is my birthday, so help yourself!
Mom, I want grapes!
Keep it a secret from dad.
Spread watermelon over your body and let maggots eat you up!
I need a glass full of beer right away.
Taste this cherry. Isn't it funny?
Dance to the rythm! Whoa!
I'm making a house for a larva in this apple.
The earth is crying for us to leave!
Hey, you. Peel these onions.
You know how to cut pumpkins? Wish you'd cut your hand too!
Sit down. I'll draw a cat on your forehead.
I want to give your dog a kiss. Please?
I want to extract your pee to make a perfume.
I need a pork belly... Mmm.
Twinkle twinkle little star...
Hush little baby, don't you cry...
There was a farmer who had a dog and BINGO was his name, oh!
Do you know the muffin man, who lives in drury lane!
Grandma, give me an apple.
His spine dances like a worm! Haha!
Mister, please be my mom!
Miss, Aren't you gonna be my dad?
Cook a fish for me. Hmph?
Scratch your eyes with a needle and you'll see better.
Mom will come back soon from her trip!
A trip to heaven, you mean!
He's so cute!
A cat! Fly higher!
He always eats scissors. A nail tastes good as well.
You do the hokey pokey and you turn yourself around!
You should thank this bowl.
Let's decorate the crocodile!
If there's spicy chicken noodles, will you take it?
Take this powder and don't ask what it is!
Withered, breaking down... Slowly dying.
...I'm not saying that I would still plant my apple tree.
Why do you look at me that way? You aren't fond of a troublesome kid?
I should've stayed dead...
We are way more fragile than the petals.
Don't worry and wipe your tears!
Don't be silly!
Stretch your back and plant your feet!
I know that you will survive this!
No, no. You shouldn't fall before me!
Just don't fall and do what you can do.
Heir, I don't blame you.
Now I see why he gave me the stick.
Blessings of the old tree upon you.
Flowers blossom in the desert.
Nothing stands forever, so live in the moment.
A wounded flower is yet a flower.
Blooming and falling... Then blooming again.
I'll send this flower to the grave.
Old spice will make you stronger for 16 hours!
From the lowest bush to the highest treetop, life will rise.
Smack them!
Let's weed them out!
The one falling is you, not me.
Life and death. Love and birth.
Momentary Miracle
A miracle took place. Huge blossoms surround the estate and the heroes are soothed and sedated.
Get away!
What if she takes the Seed?
I'll take the Seed!
You wanna fight me?
I'll be the one who finds the Seed!
You tried to bloom the seed, didn't you!
Dying again... for the Seed?
Why should I die once more? No!
Diluted elixir
Absorbing Light
{colour_start|blight}Blighted{colour_end}
I'm not going in there!
Why are you sending me here?
Do you know this is child abuse?
Ugh, gross.
Normal people don't send kids here.
You got milk? No? Urgh, thanks.
...Are you serious?
You see that barrel there? Yeah, your dad's piece is in there.
Oh, you like flowers? Then be underground with the roots!
You can't call mental illness a just desire.
YOU FUCKING SICK INSANE SOCIOPATH!!!
Do you really think this is a good thing for anyone?
No, I won't.
Stop.
Lantern's Console
%+d%% torchlight
Courtyard
Friendly Skill
{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 1 pts/rd for 2 rds
{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 1-2 pts/rd for 2 rds
{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 2 pts/rd for 2 rds
{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 2-3 pts/rd for 2 rds
{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 3 pts/rd for 2 rds
(rummages through her bag in a hurry.)
I need healing! ...Wait, I'm a healer.
How did you hit a child so hard?!
If I cry, I lose.... (crying)
What The F...lower!
Aggh, Mom....
Tch... Are your imitating father now?
Hold on. I'll heal you now!
Whoa, that was... Geez.
Payback is what you get!
You will not die. But you are almost dead.
Well, I still have enough elixirs.
Don't die before the elixir is ready, okay?
If you die, please say hello to my mom.
BLOOD! Blood, blood, blood... This is terrible.
Ahhhagh! Blood! Wrap this wound up right now!
Can't you give me a handkerchief?
So, you don't happen to have a bandage for me, Huh?
Can I have some bandages, please?
Tch, I should've brought blood revival flower.
When hero is hit: Other Heroes: 4 {colour_start|red}damage{colour_end}
When hero is hit: Other Heroes: CRT -5%%
Lotus Shield
Laxification's Hug
Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}
Cure {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end}
{colour_start|healhp}Regeneration{colour_end} amount %+d%%
Hero was hit:
